summary.para: Extension methods for accessing the Google spatializer's properties on the AudioListener.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.Experimental.Audio.Google.GvrAudioListenerExtensionMethods.GetGlobalGainDb(UnityEngine.AudioListener)

summary.para: Get the global gain, in decibels, that will be applied to the Google spatializer renderer's mixed output.

member.param: This is the AudioListener affected by these Google spatializer extension properties.

returns.para: Returns the global gain, in decibels.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.Experimental.Audio.Google.GvrAudioListenerExtensionMethods.SetQuality(UnityEngine.AudioListener,UnityEngine.Experimental.Audio.Google.GvrAudioQuality)

summary.para: Set the Google spatializer's rendering quality.

member.param: This is the AudioListener affected by these Google spatializer extension properties.
Rendering quality setting.

summary.para: Google spatializer rendering quality.
High-quality binaural rendering using third-order HRTF.
Low-quality binaural rendering using first-order HRTF.
Stereo-only rendering.
The Google spatializer's audio room component that simulates the environmental effects of a room.
Room surface material of the GvrAudioRoom's back wall (negative z direction).
Room surface material of the GvrAudioRoom's ceiling (positive y direction).
Room surface material of the GvrAudioRoom's floor (negative y direction).
Room surface material of the GvrAudioRoom's front wall (positive z direction).
Room surface material of the GvrAudioRoom's left wall (negative x direction).
Reflectivity scalar for each surface in the GvrAudioRoom.
GvrAudioRoom's reverb brightness modifier.
GvrAudioRoom's reverb gain modifier, in decibels.
GvrAudioRoom's reverb time modifier.
Room surface material of the GvrAudioRoom's right wall (positive x direction).
Size of GvrAudioRoom's room, normalized with respect to the scale of the game object.
Constructor.
Material type that determines the acoustic properties of a GvrAudioRoom surface (walls, ceiling, and floor).
Acoustic ceiling tiles.
Bare brick.
Painted brick.
Course concrete block.
Painted concrete block.
Heavy curtain.
Fiberglass insulation.
Thick glass.
Thin glass.
Grass.
Linoleum on concrete.
Marble.
Galvanized sheet metal.
Parquet on concrete.
Rough plaster.
Smooth plaster.
Plywood panel.
Polished concrete or tile.
Sheetrock.
Transparent.
Water or ice.
Wood ceiling.
Wood panel.
